title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, December 14, 2019
description: On this date in 1542, six-day-old Mary Stuart ascended the throne of Scotland. She spent her childhood in France and returned to rule Scotland when she was 18.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1542, six-day-old Mary Stuart ascended the throne of Scotland. She spent her childhood in France and returned to rule Scotland when she was 18.
